speaker: AJAX
text:
Troilus
              ,
               
              thou
               
              coward
               
              Troilus
              ,
               
              show
               
              thy
               
              head
              !

speaker: DIOMEDES
text:
Troilus
              ,
               
              I
               
              say
              !
               
              Where’s
               
              Troilus
              ?

speaker: AJAX
text:
What
               
              wouldst
               
              thou
              ?

speaker: DIOMEDES
text:
I
               
              would
               
              correct
               
              him
              .

speaker: AJAX
text:
Were
               
              I
               
              the
               
              General
              ,
               
              thou
               
              shouldst
               
              have
               
              my
               
              office

speaker: AJAX
text:
Ere
               
              that
               
              correction
              .
              —
              Troilus
              ,
               
              I
               
              say
              !
               
              What
              ,
               
              Troilus
              !

speaker: TROILUS
text:
O
               
              traitor
               
              Diomed
              !
               
              Turn
               
              thy
               
              false
               
              face
              ,
               
              thou
               
              traitor
              ,

speaker: TROILUS
text:
And
               
              pay
               
              the
               
              life
               
              thou
               
              owest
               
              me
               
              for
               
              my
               
              horse
              !

speaker: DIOMEDES
text:
Ha
              !
               
              Art
               
              thou
               
              there
              ?

speaker: AJAX
text:
I’ll
               
              fight
               
              with
               
              him
               
              alone
              .
               
              Stand
              ,
               
              Diomed
              .

speaker: DIOMEDES
text:
He
               
              is
               
              my
               
              prize
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              look
               
              upon
              .

speaker: TROILUS
text:
Come
              ,
               
              both
               
              you
               
              cogging
               
              Greeks
              .
               
              Have
               
              at
               
              you
               
              both
              !

speaker: HECTOR
text:
Yea
              ,
               
              Troilus
              ?
               
              O
              ,
               
              well
               
              fought
              ,
               
              my
               
              youngest
               
              brother
              !

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Now
               
              do
               
              I
               
              see
               
              thee
              .
               
              Ha
              !
               
              Have
               
              at
               
              thee
              ,
               
              Hector
              !

speaker: HECTOR
text:
Pause
               
              if
               
              thou
               
              wilt
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
I
               
              do
               
              disdain
               
              thy
               
              courtesy
              ,
               
              proud
               
              Trojan
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Be
               
              happy
               
              that
               
              my
               
              arms
               
              are
               
              out
               
              of
               
              use
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
My
               
              rest
               
              and
               
              negligence
               
              befriends
               
              thee
               
              now
              ,

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
But
               
              thou
               
              anon
               
              shalt
               
              hear
               
              of
               
              me
               
              again
              ;

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Till
               
              when
              ,
               
              go
               
              seek
               
              thy
               
              fortune
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
Fare
               
              thee
               
              well
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
I
               
              would
               
              have
               
              been
               
              much
               
              more
               
              a
               
              fresher
               
              man

text:
Had
               
              I

              thee
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              my
               
              brother
              ?

text:
Ajax
               
              hath
               
              ta’en

              .

              it
               
              be
              ?

speaker: TROILUS
text:
No
              ,
               
              by
               
              the

              of
               
              yonder
               
              glorious
               
              heaven
              ,

speaker: TROILUS
text:
He
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              carry
               
              him
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              ta’en
               
              too

speaker: TROILUS
text:
Or
               
              bring
               
              him
               
              off
              .
               
              Fate
              ,
               
              hear
               
              me
               
              what
               
              I
               
              say
              !

speaker: TROILUS
text:
I
               
              reck
               
              not
               
              though

              my
               
              life
               
              today
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
Stand
              ,

              ,
               
              thou
               
              Greek
              !

              art
               
              a
               
              goodly
               
              mark
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
No
              ?

              not
              ?
               
              I
               
              like
               
              thy
               
              armor
               
              well
              .

speaker: HECTOR
text:
I’ll

              all

text:
